channel.title: reality
channel.description: Design is a blank page with strings

item.title: Design Is a Blank Page With Strings
item.author: Victor Raeva
item.description: Our decisions define the outcome of what we become. In most cases, it is as difficult as teaching rap music to a Vietnamese from the South or as complex as handling reconciliation logic in a Kubernetes controller â€“ of course, ensuring that the desired state of the resources matches the actual state in a highly dynamic and distributed environment. This same view relates to the world of technology. Small, attainable decisions beget grounded domain knowledge, and this knowledge ushers us into the futuristic reality we desire.
